title: Reddit
cleaned_text: to Destiny Reddit! This sub is for discussing Bungie's Destiny 2 and its predecessor, Destiny. Please read the sidebar rules and be sure to search for your question before posting. Warlock main here. Doing the gm this week, we felt that an aeon was pretty crucial for ammo. But omnioculus and ursas were crucial too. So I was debating how to maximize well uptime for the boss room and came back to energy converter. It gives up super energy when you throw a grenade based on your cwl stacks. It will never go past the 50% mark and 4 charges seem to be about 35%. It's great to drop a well, throw a grenade to get 35% back, then pick up some more orbs and throw another grenade because benevolent dawn should get your grenade back pretty quickly.
